name: Three/one
description:
You control 3 player as one. 

You need to go to the top of the "box" so you go to the another level.

There are 10 stages. I have make a tutorial video for them!

I personally recommend downloadable version but is your decision!

Thanks to: 

1)beetpro  (one music)

2)SergeQuadrado (three musics)

3)Defekt Maschine (one music)

I got the music from pixabay.com
